story_galar_01_04000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Well, well! What a pleasure to have Prince Lear
himself welcome us!
story_galar_01_04000/2401_1001_0200_10: We heard you wanted to discuss sync stones...
story_galar_01_04000/2401_1001_0300_10: That’s correct! Let’s talk as soon as possible!
story_galar_01_04000/2401_1001_0400_10:
I’m committed to solving the energy problem in the
Galar region—and, of course, around the world.
story_galar_01_04000/2401_1001_0500_10:
I’ve been scratching my head every day and
haven’t been able to find the perfect solution...
story_galar_01_04000/2401_1001_0600_10:
However, the power within these sync stones is
truly remarkable!
story_galar_01_04000/2401_1001_0700_10:
It even has the potential to save the future a
millennium from now!
story_galar_01_04000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Let’s change the sync stones’ management system
right away...
story_galar_01_04000/2401_1001_1100_10:
and funnel all the resources used in its research
into energy development instead!
story_galar_01_04000/2401_1001_1300_10:
But changing it so quickly would be far
too sudden...
story_galar_01_04000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Using sync stones to develop energy is a
wonderful idea.
story_galar_01_04000/2401_1001_1600_10:
However, sync stones have value beyond being a
good source of energy.
story_galar_01_04000/2401_1001_1700_10:
We don’t want to limit the use of sync stones to a
single purpose.
story_galar_01_04000/2401_1001_1900_10:
Sync stones can enrich the connection between
people and Pokémon.
story_galar_01_04000/2401_1001_2000_10:
We shouldn’t rush our research on how to use
sync stones "correctly."
story_galar_01_04000/2401_1001_2200_10:
On Pasio, there are people who try to abuse sync
stones’ power.
story_galar_01_04000/2401_1001_2300_10:
We wouldn’t want to abandon sync stones’
boundless potential by limiting our research to
simply energy production.
story_galar_01_04000/2401_1001_2400_10:
There are also still many mysteries surrounding
sync stones. Thus, they can be unstable at times.
story_galar_01_04000/2401_1001_2500_10:
I want to spend time examining the utility and
dangers of sync stones from multiple angles.
story_galar_01_04000/2401_1001_2600_10:
As someone responsible for sync stone research,
I cannot compromise on this.
story_galar_01_04000/2401_1001_2700_10: I see... I understand how you two feel.
story_galar_01_04000/2401_1001_2800_10: Let me think over my idea.
story_galar_01_04000/2401_1001_2900_10: Thank you for your valuable time.
